version_description:
Initially, the tablet-optimised Guide will only be available for the S-Class. Further model series are currently in preparation and will soon be available in a tablet version. Would you like to continue using the smartphone version of the Mercedes-Benz Guides for A-Class, B-Class, E-Class, CLA-Class and Citan on your tablet? If so, please do not update the app.

The following Mercedes-Benz Guides are available at present:
Passenger cars: A-Class, B-Class, CLA-Class, E-Class, S-Class
Vans: Citan
Further model series to follow.

The following Mercedes-Benz Guides are available for tablets at present:
Passenger cars: S-Class
Further model series to follow.
Other Mercedes-Benz models are available via the smartphone app of the same name.

• Modified design
• Adaptation to iOS7
• Demo clip on using the Mercedes-Benz Guides app

Performance optimisation for the vehicle selection screen
Download indicator for update in progress
Adjustment of the vehicles and model years in the vehicle selection

* Supported latest iOS 11 and above versions.
* Upgraded Frameworks.
* Bug fixes.

Performance optimisation for the vehicle selection screen
Download indicator for update in progress
Adjustment of the vehicles and model years in the vehicle selection

* Supported latest iOS 11 and above versions.
* Upgraded Frameworks.
* Bug fixes.

* Zoom in & Zoom out functionality
* Open/download PDF guides within App
* Bug fixes for missing guides and UI Inconsistency

* Change of APP owner from Daimler AG to Mercedes-Benz AG
* Change in provider and legal policies corresponding to organisation changes
* Minor bug fixes
* Supported latest iOS 13
軽微なバグの修正と新機能
